dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT FMAT.application_name ,FMA.application_bundle_id ,FMA.application_short_name ,FMA.parent_application_short_name ,FMA.push_enabled ,FMD.mobile_os ,FMD.application_version ,TO_CHAR(FMA.last_update_date,'DD-MON-YYYY') APP_LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(FMD.last_update_date,'DD-MON-YYYY') DIST_LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(FMD.creation_date,'DD-MON-YYYY') DIST_CREATION_DATE FROM fnd_mbl_application FMA ,fnd_mbl_application_tl FMAT ,fnd_mbl_distributions FMD WHERE FMA.status = 'ENABLED' AND FMA.application_id = FMAT.application_id AND FMA.application_id = FMD.application_id ORDER BY FMAT.application_name,FMD.mobile_os

SELECT FMAT.application_name ,FMPT.display_name parameter_name ,FMPV.parameter_value ,FMPV.parameter_type ,FMC.config_template ,FMC.config_file ,TO_CHAR(FMPV.last_update_date,'DD-MON-YYYY') last_update_date ,TO_CHAR(FMPV.creation_date,'DD-MON-YYYY') creation_date FROM fnd_mbl_application FMA ,fnd_mbl_application_tl FMAT ,fnd_mbl_configurations FMC ,fnd_mbl_config_param_values FMPV ,fnd_mbl_config_params_tl FMPT WHERE FMA.status = 'ENABLED' AND FMA.application_id = FMAT.application_id AND FMA.application_id = FMC.application_id AND FMC.configuration_id = FMPV.configuration_id AND FMPV.parameter_id = FMPT.parameter_id ORDER BY FMAT.application_name,FMPV.parameter_id
